sentences.english: At some altitudes snow never melts.
sentences.chinese: 在有些高度雪從來不融。

sentences.english: To make that possible, users will be required to log into RockMelt.
sentences.chinese: 爲了實現這一點，用戶將必需登錄巖融瀏覽器。

sentences.english: RockMelt’s timing may give it a better chance at success.
sentences.chinese: 巖融推出的時機可能會使它更有機會成功。

sentences.english: But packaging simple and complex in one can be a challenge.
sentences.chinese: 融簡單與複雜爲一爐，這可是個艱鉅的挑戰。

sentences.english: Syncretistic pressure can be seen today.
sentences.chinese: 融的壓力，可以看出今天。

sentences.english: General Fu Rong attempted to give a counterattack, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 大將苻融試圖反擊卻已經來不及了。

sentences.english: Castle Peak melting of the clean water, the ancient Great Wall as one of the Holy Land tour.
sentences.chinese: 融青山，碧水，古長城爲一體的旅遊休閒聖地。
